8f1fa9bc405f4c5a86508","dweb:/ipfs/QmbcBmFX66AY6Kbhnd5gx7zpkgqnUafo43XnmayAM7zVdB"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/InsuranceFund.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5a1d9dba00a1a98b0cdebfd8f5b018d17c7a7f9d3a4fffce4fdec060635abde9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d342ba26274ba4e429a2866492a12a453145e83b8f8b427ca4f4d3ade8242721","dweb:/ipfs/QmXCfX7bR4ks99DiDGPtrNFhitNQZffpDX831UtzGNYeqW"]},"src/Interfaces/IInsuranceFund.sol":{"keccak256":"0x411fc33c617848760fc29689187f3c27e2a59f313b300662a06d4f6d25ab741a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f8f72a888f5f92ca447936ee6a386692556d3248cb4a0f7305326bafff11286a","dweb:/ipfs/QmSKDfom3ood9GoToZ8mdZAJSnyR8gVdS7wX5yoty5nY1X"]}},"version":1}

params.clearinghouse_: Core clearinghouse authorized to request payouts (optional at deploy time).
params.quoteToken_: ERC20 token used for all accounting and payouts (e.g., USDC/WETH).

donate(uint256).details: Implementation may ignore or use this purely for accounting; tokens should already be transferred.

onFeeReceived(uint256).details: Implementations should restrict caller to the configured router.

params.amount: Amount of quote tokens received (1e18 if quote has 18 decimals).

payout(address,uint256).details: Implementations should restrict caller to an authorized module (e.g., Clearinghouse) and ensure sufficient balance.

rescueToken(address,address,uint256).details: Admin-only in implementation; quote token rescue should typically be disallowed or guarded.

balance().notice: Current available balance in quote token as tracked by the fund.

donate(uint256).notice: Optional convenience to donate to the fund with prior approval and transferFrom in implementation.

isAuthorized(address).notice: Returns whether an address is authorized to request payouts.

isRouter(address).notice: Returns whether an address is an authorized fee router.

onFeeReceived(uint256).notice: Accounting hook for the fee router to call after transferring quote tokens in.

payout(address,uint256).notice: Transfer funds out to a target, e.g., to cover bad debt or pay incentives.

quoteToken().notice: Quote token held by this fund for payouts (per-market fund recommended).

rescueToken(address,address,uint256).notice: Rescue arbitrary tokens mistakenly sent to this contract.

setAuthorized(address,bool).notice: Set or revoke an authorized caller that can request payouts.

setClearinghouse(address).notice: Set the clearinghouse address responsible for orchestrating payouts.

setFeeRouter(address,bool).notice: Enables or disables a fee router address. Only callable by the owner.

totalReceived().notice: Cumulative accounting: total fees and donations received.
